examples: Her family is English to the core.
The English test was no problem for Pedro.
The full English breakfast included a generous portion of black pudding alongside eggs, bacon, and beans.
I can count up to fifty in English.
I read English at Oxford.
words.defineEn: the most common language in the world, originating in England but also the official language of America, Canada, Australia, etc.
words.defineVi: ngôn ngữ thông dụng nhất thế giới, bắt nguồn từ nước Anh mà còn là ngôn ngữ chính thức của Mỹ, Canada, Úc, v.v.

examples: But when spoken out loud, they are about as mutually intelligible as US and British English.
words.defineEn: the English language as used in the United Kingdom
words.defineVi: ngôn ngữ tiếng Anh như được sử dụng ở Vương quốc Anh

examples: Jeans are as American as apple pie.
He sounded American as apple pie.
As an American, she had little truck with the painful formality of English life.
Coca-Cola is a famous American soft drink.
The Statue of Liberty is a famous American landmark.
words.defineEn: American English; the English language as used in the United States
words.defineVi: Tiếng Anh - Mỹ; ngôn ngữ tiếng Anh như được sử dụng ở Hoa Kỳ

examples: My sister packed some Spanish limes in her picnic basket for a tangy snack on our outdoor adventure.
She made a Spanish omelette by frying sliced potatoes and onions with beaten eggs.
In Spanish culture, it is common to greet others with a kiss on each cheek.
Flamenco is a traditional Spanish dance that is known for its expressive movements.
I love watching Spanish movies with subtitles to improve my language skills.
words.defineEn: the main language of Spain and many Southern or Central American countries
words.defineVi: ngôn ngữ chính của Tây Ban Nha và nhiều nước Nam hoặc Trung Mỹ

examples: The caretaker had taken French leave.
The French army held the town for three days.
Her favorite perfume is a French brand.
French cuisine is known for its delicious cheeses and wines.
The head teacher usually takes us for French.
words.defineEn: the main language of France that is also spoken in parts of other countries such as Canada, Switzerland, Belgium, etc.
words.defineVi: ngôn ngữ chính của Pháp cũng được nói ở một số quốc gia khác như Canada, Thụy Sĩ, Bỉ, v.v.

examples: German engineering is highly regarded for its precision and quality.
The German language is widely spoken in Germany and other European countries.
The German education system is highly regarded for its emphasis on academic excellence.
I wouldn't call German an easy language.
Let's serve traditional German dishes.
words.defineEn: the main language in Germany, Austria and parts of Switzerland
words.defineVi: ngôn ngữ chính ở Đức, Áo và một phần của Thụy Sĩ

examples: Italian coffee, like espresso and cappuccino, is enjoyed all around the world.
Italian fashion brands like Gucci and Prada are renowned for their luxury and style.
My Italian friend told me to combine tagliatelle with a rich tomato and basil sauce for a traditional pasta dish.
The Italian champion was in second position when he came to grief on the third lap.
Italian gelato is a delicious frozen treat that comes in a variety of flavors and is enjoyed by people of all ages.
words.defineEn: the main language in Italy, and in parts of Switzerland
words.defineVi: ngôn ngữ chính ở Ý và ở một số vùng của Thụy Sĩ

examples: From their perspective, Portuguese traders offered them access to new markets and access to new goods.
And all that knowledge gave Portuguese sailors a huge competitive advantage when it came to exploration.
Unless, of course, you speak Portuguese.
And then the Portuguese ventured further afield into the Indian Ocean.
This is a Portuguese Man o’ War.
words.defineEn: the Romance language of Portugal and Brazil
words.defineVi: ngôn ngữ Lãng mạn của Bồ Đào Nha và Brazil

examples: We went Dutch on a meal in the new restaurant in Shaftesbury Avenue.
The Dutch team have dropped to fifth place.

I'll go Dutch with you on the movie if you want.
Many women are happy to go Dutch with a new boyfriend on the first date.
words.defineEn: the main language in the Netherlands
words.defineVi: ngôn ngữ chính ở Hà Lan

examples: My mother spoke Russian.
Did you really get to third base with that Russian chick like in the movie?
Russian collusion, give me a break.

Russian forces shot the first round.
words.defineEn: the official language of Russia
words.defineVi: ngôn ngữ chính thức của Nga

examples: I am studying Chinese.
The US wants access to Chinese markets.
What became of those Chinese vases that Mum used to have?
We couldn't understand them because they were talking in Chinese.
She attended a cooking class where she learned to prepare a Chinese dish using water chestnut as the main ingredient.
words.defineEn: any of the Sino-Tibetan languages of China
words.defineVi: bất kỳ ngôn ngữ Hán-Tạng nào của Trung Quốc

examples: The Japanese company is light years ahead of its European competitors.

After a little light window-shopping, I had dinner in a super-stylish Japanese restaurant.
The Japanese cherry trees in my garden are in full bloom, creating a picturesque scene.

words.defineEn: the language spoken in Japan
words.defineVi: ngôn ngữ được sử dụng ở Nhật Bản

examples: My other neighbor was Vietnamese.

The Taliban are not the North Vietnamese army.
words.defineEn: the language spoken in Vietnam
words.defineVi: ngôn ngữ nói ở việt nam

examples: Nobody has ever made head or tail of Greek music.
For a simple and healthy dessert, try topping Greek yogurt with tamarillo slices.

The two lawyers were both known for their aggressive tactics, so when they faced each other in court, it was a case of when Greek meets Greek, then comes the tug of war.
The two lawyers were both known for their aggressive tactics, so when they faced each other in court, it was a case of when Greek meets Greek, then comes the tug of war.
words.defineEn: the ancient or modern language of Greece
words.defineVi: ngôn ngữ cổ đại hoặc hiện đại của Hy Lạp

examples: For example, in Hindi, the typical order is subject, object, verb.

words.defineEn: one of the official languages of India, used in the north part of the country
words.defineVi: một trong những ngôn ngữ chính thức của Ấn Độ, được sử dụng ở phía bắc của đất nước

examples: So, Muslim scholars translated hundreds of thousands of manuscripts from Greek, Roman, Persian, Indian, and Egyptian scientists into Arabic.

He learned two new Arabic dialects.
It's written in Arabic.
words.defineEn: the language of the Arabs

examples: Traditionally, Turkish carpets are handwoven by women.

Azerbaijan's successful military campaign was helped by Turkish know-how and drone technology.

words.defineEn: the main language of Turkey

examples: She received a warning for using incorrect grammar in her writing assignment.

words.defineEn: the study or use of words and the way they are put together or changed to make sentences
words.defineVi: nghiên cứu hoặc sử dụng các từ và cách chúng được đặt cùng nhau hoặc thay đổi để tạo thành câu

examples: Give your mother the letter.
His letter to the papers stirred up a real hornets' nest.

That letter should go by special delivery.
I wrote a letter to Alison.
words.defineEn: any of the characters in the alphabet that stand for a sound
words.defineVi: bất kỳ ký tự nào trong bảng chữ cái đại diện cho âm thanh

examples: Words beginning with a vowel.
Mark my words.
Her words were music to my ears.

words.defineEn: (grammar) a unit of language that has a specific meaning
words.defineVi: (ngữ pháp) một đơn vị ngôn ngữ có ý nghĩa cụ thể

examples: His incorrect translation of the phrase caused a misunderstanding between the two parties.

words.defineEn: a group of words put together that has meaning
words.defineVi: một nhóm từ ghép lại với nhau có nghĩa

examples: A sentence always starts with a capital letter.

words.defineEn: a group of words that forms a statement, question, exclamation, or instruction, usually containing a verb
words.defineVi: một nhóm từ tạo thành một tuyên bố, câu hỏi, cảm thán, hoặc hướng dẫn, thường chứa một động từ

examples: from now on, i need you to give me original examples with different verb conjugations for every idiom that i give u, please use imaginary names in your examples

words.defineVi: (ngữ pháp) một từ hoặc cụm từ được sử dụng để mô tả một hành động, trạng thái hoặc kinh nghiệm

examples: I got the adjective.
- I almost said an adjective.

words.defineEn: a type of word that describes a noun
words.defineVi: một loại từ mô tả một danh từ

examples: In American Sign Language, nouns and their related verbs sometimes have the same handshape and location, but different movement.

To me, cancer is a verb, not a noun.

words.defineEn: a word that is used to name a person, thing, event, state, etc.
words.defineVi: một từ được sử dụng để đặt tên cho một người, sự vật, sự kiện, trạng thái, v.v.

examples: They use online resources to study grammar and vocabulary in the language.
I learn new vocabulary everyday.

words.defineEn: all the words used in a particular language or subject
words.defineVi: tất cả các từ được sử dụng trong một ngôn ngữ hoặc chủ đề cụ thể

examples: But if the words and the actions don't match, an adverb can be helpful.
I think it's act quickly, isn't it an adverb?
I don't care what an adverb is, or a pronoun.

words.defineEn: a word that gives more information about a verb, adjective, or another adverb
words.defineVi: một từ cung cấp thêm thông tin về một động từ, tính từ hoặc trạng từ khác

examples: The rental agreement had an escape clause that allowed the tenant to terminate the lease early if they needed to move for work purposes.
Verbs that take both the infinitive and the finite clause as their object.

words.defineEn: (grammar) a group of words that contains a subject and a verb and functions as a unit within a sentence
words.defineVi: (ngữ pháp) một nhóm từ chứa chủ ngữ và động từ và hoạt động như một đơn vị trong câu
